mapper.select: SELECT A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, A.DIVISION_ONE, A.DIVISION_TWO, A.DIVISION_THREE, B.MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY_SEQ, B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, B.DIVISION_YEAR, B.PAYMENT_END_DT, B.APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ, B.DIVISION_MONTH, B.PAYMENT_AMOUNT, ( SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) FROM MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY WHERE APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ = #{aptDetailInfoSeq} AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_YEAR, 0, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_MONTH, 0, 2) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 1 ) AS SUM_MAINTENANCE_COST FROM MAINTENANCE_COST_CD A JOIN MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY B ON (A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ = B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ) WHERE B.APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ = #{aptDetailInfoSeq} AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_YEAR, 0, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_MONTH, 0, 2) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 1 ORDER BY B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ

SELECT A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, C.DIVISION_THREE, TRUNC(AVG(A.PAYMENT_AMOUNT)) AS AVG_MAINTENANCE_COST FROM MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY A JOIN APT_DETAIL_INFO B ON (A.APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ = B.APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ) JOIN MAINTENANCE_COST_CD C ON (A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ = C.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ) WHERE B.SQUARE_MEASURE = #{squareMeasure} AND DIVISION_ONE = '개별사용료' AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_YEAR, 0, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_MONTH, 0, 2) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 2 GROUP BY C.DIVISION_THREE, A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ ORDER BY A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ

SELECT A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, A.DIVISION_ONE, A.DIVISION_TWO, A.DIVISION_THREE, B.MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY_SEQ, B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, B.DIVISION_YEAR, B.PAYMENT_END_DT, B.APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ, B.DIVISION_MONTH, B.PAYMENT_AMOUNT, ( SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) FROM MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY WHERE APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ = #{aptDetailInfoSeq} AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_YEAR, 0, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_MONTH, 0, 2) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 2 ) AS SUM_MAINTENANCE_COST FROM MAINTENANCE_COST_CD A JOIN MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY B ON (A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ = B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ) WHERE B.APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ = #{aptDetailInfoSeq} AND DIVISION_ONE = '개별사용료' AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_YEAR, 0, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_MONTH, 0, 2) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 2 ORDER BY B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ

SELECT A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, A.DIVISION_ONE, A.DIVISION_TWO, A.DIVISION_THREE, B.MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY_SEQ, B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, B.DIVISION_YEAR, B.PAYMENT_END_DT, B.APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ, B.DIVISION_MONTH, B.PAYMENT_AMOUNT, ( SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) FROM MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY WHERE APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ = #{aptDetailInfoSeq} AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_YEAR, 0, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_MONTH, 0, 2) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 1 ) AS SUM_MAINTENANCE_COST FROM MAINTENANCE_COST_CD A JOIN MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY B ON (A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ = B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ) WHERE B.APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ = #{aptDetailInfoSeq} AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_YEAR, 0, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_MONTH, 0, 2) BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 5 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 1 ORDER BY B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, B.DIVISION_MONTH

SELECT SUM(A.PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS SUM_MONTH_COST, A.DIVISION_MONTH, B.DIVISION_ONE FROM MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY A JOIN MAINTENANCE_COST_CD B ON (A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ = B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ) WHERE APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ = #{aptDetailInfoSeq} AND SUBSTR(A.DIVISION_YEAR, 0, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND SUBSTR(A.DIVISION_MONTH, 0, 2) BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 5 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 1 GROUP BY A.DIVISION_MONTH, B.DIVISION_ONE ORDER BY A.DIVISION_MONTH
